credentials.title: Authentication mechanism
credentials.description: Choose how to authenticate to Asana

workspaces.title: Workspace IDs
workspaces.description: The IDs of the workspaces to fetch. If not provided, all workspaces will be fetched.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: The number of records to request from the API per call.

api_timeout.title: API Timeout
api_timeout.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) to use when making requests to Asana API. 0 means no timeout.

max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to the Asana API.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date at which to stop syncing data.

project_tasks_max_staleness_hours.title: Project Tasks Max Staleness (hours)
project_tasks_max_staleness_hours.description: The maximum allowed time (in hours) that the project-task relationship can remain without being refreshed.

required_task_custom_fields.title: Required Task Custom Fields gid(s)
required_task_custom_fields.description: Only fetch tasks that have at least one of the specified custom fields set.
